about_the_game:
Welcome to Old Forest Ranch

A place where the lush green forest meets the rolling hills of the countryside. As a young farmer, you've decided to build your dream ranch here, but there's just one problem – the forest is being invaded by evil scarecrows! Your mission is to protect your land, your crops, and fellow farmers from these wicked enemies while creating a thriving ranch!

Grow crops till you drop!

Plant your crops, fulfill orders, and complete jobs to grow your farm, all while defending it against waves of scarecrows. Use a variety of weapons, traps, and upgrades to keep them at bay and protect your land. Earn money by selling your harvest and use it to upgrade your farm and weapons to face even greater challenges.

In Old Forest Ranch, you can:

  • Plant and harvest a variety of crops and sell your harvest for profit
  • Fight off waves of evil scarecrows with an arsenal of weapons and traps
  • Buy new weapons and unlock farm jobs to improve your ranch and fend off even stronger enemies
  • Explore the rich and vibrant forest, uncovering secrets and meeting new characters

Get out there and explore!

With immersive gameplay, charming characters, and a colorful world to explore, Old Forest Ranch is the ultimate farming/forest adventure. Protect your ranch and defeat the evil scarecrows to save the forest and become the ultimate farmer hero. Play now and embark on a wild adventure!

Welcome to Old Forest Ranch

A place where the lush green forest meets the rolling hills of the countryside. Earn money by selling your harvest and use it to upgrade your farm and weapons to face even greater challenges.

name: Old Forest Ranch

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA: Maxwell-generation cards or newer | AMD: GCN-generation cards or newer
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: Not Supported
  • Additional Notes: Windows 11 with support for DirectX 12 Agility SDK are supported
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA: Maxwell-generation cards or newer | AMD: GCN-generation cards or newer
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: Not Supported
  • Additional Notes: Windows 11 with support for DirectX 12 Agility SDK are supported

short_description: Defend your farm from evil scarecrows in Old Forest Ranch, a thrilling blend of farming simulation and action gameplay. Plant crops, complete jobs, and use a variety of weapons to defeat waves of Scarecrows to save the forest.
